scripts.build: doppler run -- sh -c "esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.js --sourcemap --packages=external && ( [ '$ACT_LOCAL' = 'true' ] && echo 'Skipping swagger generation in act environment' || [ '$SKIP_ENV_VALIDATION' = 'true' ] && echo 'Skipping swagger generation in Docker build' || pnpm exec tsx src/utils/swagger/generate-swagger.ts )"
scripts.build:docker: doppler run -- sh -c "NODE_ENV=production SERVER_PORT=3000 esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node20 --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.js --sourcemap --packages=external && NODE_ENV=production SERVER_PORT=3000 pnpm exec tsx src/utils/swagger/generate-swagger.ts"
scripts.dev: doppler run -- sh -c "pnpm exec tsx src/utils/swagger/generate-swagger.ts && pnpm exec nodemon --config nodemon.json"
scripts.generate-swagger: doppler run -- pnpm exec tsx src/utils/swagger/generate-swagger.ts
scripts.lint: doppler run -- sh -c "pnpm exec oxlint ./src && pnpm exec eslint ./src --ext .ts,.tsx"
scripts.lint:fix: doppler run -- sh -c "pnpm exec oxlint ./src --fix && pnpm exec eslint ./src --ext .ts,.tsx --fix"
scripts.lint:ci: doppler run -- sh -c "pnpm exec oxlint ./src --max-warnings=0 && pnpm exec eslint ./src --ext .ts,.tsx --max-warnings 0"
scripts.test: doppler run -- pnpm exec vitest run --silent --config vitest.config.ts
scripts.test:coverage: doppler run -- pnpm exec vitest run --coverage
